results.title: Deciphering the Roles of Metformin in Alzheimer's Disease: A Snapshot
results.text_hl: ...The Effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@Neuronal Loss@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Leprosy_Tuberculoid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015441 @@@Neural Dysfunction@@@

citations.NLM: Liao W, Xu J, Li B, Ruan Y, Li T, Liu J. Deciphering the Roles of Metformin in Alzheimer's Disease: A Snapshot Front Pharmacol. 2021;12():728315. PMID: 35153733

results.title: Metformin Ameliorates Abeta Pathology by Insulin-Degrading Enzyme in a Transgenic Mouse Model of Alzheimer's Disease
results.text_hl: Morris water maze and Y-maze results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could improve the learning and memory ability in APPswe/PS1dE9 (@GENE_APP @GENE_11820 @@@APP@@@/@GENE_PSEN1 @GENE_19164 @@@PS1@@@) transgenic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@. 18F-FDG PET-CT result showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could ameliorate the @<m>DISEASE_Leprosy_Tuberculoid</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015441 @@@neural dysfunction@@@ in @GENE_APP @GENE_11820 @@@APP@@@/@GENE_PSEN1 @GENE_19164 @@@PS1@@@ transgenic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Lu XY, Huang S, Chen QB, Zhang D, Li W, Ao R, Leung FC, Zhang Z, Huang J, Tang Y, Zhang SJ. Metformin Ameliorates Abeta Pathology by Insulin-Degrading Enzyme in a Transgenic Mouse Model of Alzheimer's Disease Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2020;2020():2315106. PMID: 32377293
